propose: recurrent scale approximation ( RSA , see ) unit

propose.from sentence: In this work , we propose a recurrent scale approximation ( RSA , see ) unit to achieve the goal aforementioned .

RSA unit.from sentence: The RSA unit is designed to be plugged at some specific depths in a network and to be fed with an initial feature map at the largest scale .

input.from sentence: The unit convolves the input in a recurrent manner to generate the prediction of the feature map that is half the size of the input .

first.from sentence: The first is a scale - forecast network to globally predict potential scales for a novel image and we compute feature pyramids for just a certain set of scales based on the prediction .

landmark retracing network.from sentence: The second is a landmark retracing network that retraces the location of the regressed landmarks in the preceding layers and generates a confidence score for each landmark based on the landmark feature set .

final score.from sentence: The final score of identifying a face within an anchor is thereby revised by the LRN network .

three components.from sentence: The three components can be incorporated into a unified CNN framework and trained end - to - end .

approximate.from sentence: Such a scheme could feed the network with input at one scale only and approximate the rest features at smaller scales through a learnable RSA unit - a balance considering both efficiency and accuracy .
